name: The Dragon Thief
description:
The dragon thief is an epic tile based game where you rob dragons. the dragons will not peacefully give up their gold, so they will attack. don't get hit for as long as you can,to collect treasure.use the arrow keys to move or touch the tile you want to go to. you have to pay gold to get in to each level, unless you have at least the dragon's required amount in dragon ownership. you can also change your mouse cursor buy touching the menu dragon's photo. another fun game buy Thor , 2020.

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/the-dragon-thief ,This is just a re upload of an old game
